pages.text: There is much that lies hidden in the forests and plains, at the tops of mountains, the bottom of oceans.$(br2)In these, the Druid strives to learn all the secrets they can about the world, and through these experiences gain the ability to manipulate the world in wondrous ways.

To begin, start by breaking some tall grass. To begin your journey, look for $(info) $(l:herbs/wildroot)Wildroot$() and Terra Spores, with which you can grow $(l:herbs/terra_moss)Terra Moss$().$(br2)There are a number of other $(l:basics/resources)essential resources$() that you may gather along the way, and $(cat:apparatus)devices$() that may help. $(br2)If, at any time, you find yourself "stuck", $(l:basics/letter)you may wish to read the letter included in this guide$().
